title: Poster-Generator
name: Name:
ttPosterSizePixel: Lets you set the poster size in pixel.
ttPosterSizePrint: Lets you use a paper format for the poster size.
ttName: Lets you choose a name for the shape. This will be used as the text on the text shape.
ttSize: Lets you set the shape size.
ttSizeOffset: Randomly changes the size in the specified range.
ttPosition: Lets you set the position of the shape.
ttPositionOffset: Randomly changes the position in the specified range.
ttAngle: Lets you set the angle of the shape.
ttAngleOffset: Randomly changes the angle in the specified range.
ttSpinSpeed: Lets you set the speed that the shape spins at.
ttSpeed: Lets you set the movement speed of the shape.
ttMovementAngle: Sets the angle of the movement.
ttMovementSpin: Lets the angle of the movement turn automatically.
ttSpeedOffset: Randomly changes the speed in the specified range.
ttDistance: Changes the distance between repeated shapes.
ttBounce: Makes the shape bounce at the border instead of reappearing on the other side.
ttColor: Lets you choose the color of the shape.
ttColor1: Makes the shape use a solid color.
ttColorGradient: Makes the shape use a gradient.
ttColorShape: Sets the gradient to the size of the shape.
ttColorPoster: Sets the gradient to the size of the poster.
